description:
A powerful yet easy-to-use calibration software that ensures consistent, accurate results across your entire workflow.

Calibrite PROFILER is powerful yet easy-to-use calibration software that ensures consistent, accurate results across your entire workflow. With built-in presets for beginners and advanced customization for professionals, it’s designed to help you get color right, every time.
New – Secure Application Login with user preferences
New – Camera Calibration Module and Lightroom PlugIn
New – Camera Calibration Workflow Support Documentation
New – Profile Manager Utility updated for management of Camera ICC profiles
New – Profile Manager Utility updated for management of DNG camera calibration files
New – Profile Renaming feature added to Profile Manager Utility
Updated – Streamline process combining User preferences, Product Registration and Support
Updated – Now 64-Bit Native Application (32-Bit no longer supported)
Updated – Improved Hardware Acceleration
Updated – Improved support for dual monitor configurations
Updated – Camera Calibration enhanced profile quality
Updated – Camera Calibration faster profile generation
